title: Celia in an Armchair
marks: Numbered in pencil, LR: [23/74] Signed and dated in pencil, LL: [David Hockney 80]
description: Woman sitting in armchair with legs tucked under. She wears a black spotted skirt, black hat and tie around her neck; black wood, flat profile frame
creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
